quiz.q: Which of the following are considered typical stationary emission sources in maintenance areas
Local management is responsible for ensuring that the drivers/operator s of vehicles or equipment are aware of local idling limits and comply with them
The Global Vehicles department is responsible for ensuring that FedEx Express vehicles are properly maintainted and rested as required
In California Vehicle & GSE Fleet managers are Technicians are responsible for ensuring that GSE assets are properly labeled and each remains legible at all times
Lids on parts washer tanks and solvent drums/containers must be kept closed when not in use
Match the type of equipment with the appropriate record-keeping requirement
